languages.text: {n}За фальшивой пластиной о том, что данные о происхождении этого сервочерепа удалены, обнаруживается потайная секция. Надпись внутри гласит:{/n} "Адепт Инквизитора [удалено], Ордо [удалено], Гаврилий Смирнов".

{n}Behind the fake slate stating that all data on this servo-skull's provenance was deleted, a hidden section is revealed. An inscription inside it reads,{/n} "Adept of Inquisitor [redacted] of the Ordo [redacted] Havrilius Smiroth."
languages.original_text: {n}За фальшивой пластиной о том, что данные о происхождении этого сервочерепа удалены, обнаруживается потайная секция. Надпись внутри гласит:{/n} "Адепт Инквизитора [удалено], Ордо [удалено], Гаврилий Смирнов".

traits.locale_text: {n}Behind the fake slate stating that data on this servo-skull's provenance was deleted, a hidden section is revealed. An inscription inside it runs,{/n} "Adept of Inquisitor [redacted] of the Ordo [redacted] Havrilius Smiroth."
{n}Something inside the skull thrums and screeches. In unsteady writing, its quill produces the following:{/n} "Adept of Inquisitor [redacted] of the Ordo [redacted] Havrilius Smiroth."

{n}Behind the fake slate stating that all data on this servo-skull's provenance was deleted, a hidden section is revealed. An inscription inside it reads,{/n} "Adept of Inquisitor [redacted] of the Ordo [redacted] Havrilius Smiroth."

{n}Behind the fake slate stating that all data on this servo-skull's provenance was deleted, a hidden section is revealed. An inscription inside it reads,{/n} "Adept of Inquisitor [redacted] of the Ordo [redacted] Havrilius Smiroth."
"Adept of Inquisitor [redacted] of the Ordo [redacted] Havrilius Smiroth."
"Adept of Inquisitor [redacted] of the Ordo [redacted] Havrilius Smiroth."
"Adept of Inquisitor [redacted] of the Ordo [redacted] Havrilius Smiroth."

{n}Behind the fake slate stating that data on this servo-skull's provenance was deleted, a hidden section is revealed. An inscription inside it runs,{/n} "Adept of Inquisitor [redacted] of the Ordo [redacted] Havrilius Smiroth."

languages.text: 「[削除]の異端審問官の専門家、[削除]の団、ハヴリリウス・スミロス」
languages.original_text: "Adept of Inquisitor [redacted] of the Ordo [redacted] Havrilius Smiroth."

traits.locale_text: {n}スカルの中で何かがブーンと鳴り、キーキーと音を立てた。不安定な筆跡で、羽ペンが次のように書き出した。{/n}「[削除]の異端審問官の専門家、[削除]の団、ハヴリリウス・スミロス」

languages.text: {n}Hinter der gefälschten Tafel, laut der alle Daten zur Herkunft dieses Servoschädels gelöscht wurden, befindet sich ein Geheimfach. Eine Inschrift in seinem Inneren lautet:{/n} '"Adept von Inquisitor [geschwärzt] vom Ordo [geschwärzt] Havrilius Smiroth."
languages.original_text: {n}Behind the fake slate stating that all data on this servo-skull's provenance was deleted, a hidden section is revealed. An inscription inside it reads,{/n} "Adept of Inquisitor [redacted] of the Ordo [redacted] Havrilius Smiroth."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hinter der gefälschten Tafel, laut der alle Daten zur Herkunft dieses Servoschädels gelöscht wurden, befindet sich ein Geheimfach. Eine Inschrift in seinem Inneren lautet:{/n} '"Adept von Inquisitor [geschwärzt] vom Ordo [geschwärzt] Havrilius Smiroth."

languages.text: {n}Derrière la fausse plaque indiquant que toutes les données concernant la provenance de ce servocrâne ont été effacées, vous découvrez une section dissimulée. À l'intérieur, on peut lire :{/n} « Havrilius Smiroth, agent de l'inquisiteur [censuré] de l'Ordo [censuré]. »
languages.original_text: {n}Behind the fake slate stating that all data on this servo-skull's provenance was deleted, a hidden section is revealed. An inscription inside it reads,{/n} "Adept of Inquisitor [redacted] of the Ordo [redacted] Havrilius Smiroth."

traits.locale_text: {n}Derrière la fausse plaque indiquant que toutes les données concernant la provenance de ce servocrâne ont été effacées, vous découvrez une section dissimulée. À l'intérieur, on peut lire :{/n} « Havrilius Smiroth, agent de l'inquisiteur [censuré] de l'Ordo [censuré]. »

languages.text: {n}Descubres un compartimento falso en la parte posterior de la falsa tablilla que afirma que todos los datos sobre el origen de este servocráneo han sido borrados. Dentro hay una inscripción que dice: {/n}«Acólito del inquisidor [censurado] del Ordo [censurado] Havrilius Smiroth».
languages.original_text: {n}Behind the fake slate stating that all data on this servo-skull's provenance was deleted, a hidden section is revealed. An inscription inside it reads,{/n} "Adept of Inquisitor [redacted] of the Ordo [redacted] Havrilius Smiroth."

traits.locale_text: {n}Descubres un compartimento falso en la parte posterior de la falsa tablilla que afirma que todos los datos sobre el origen de este servocráneo han sido borrados. Dentro hay una inscripción que dice: {/n}«Acólito del inquisidor [censurado] del Ordo [censurado] Havrilius Smiroth».

languages.text: {n}那块记载着“所有数据都已删除”的石板后面藏着一处暗格，里面的铭文写着：{/n}“哈维里乌斯·史密罗斯，【数据删除】审判庭成员，【数据删除】审判官的学徒。”
languages.original_text: {n}Behind the fake slate stating that all data on this servo-skull's provenance was deleted, a hidden section is revealed. An inscription inside it reads,{/n} "Adept of Inquisitor [redacted] of the Ordo [redacted] Havrilius Smiroth."

traits.locale_text: {n}那块记载着“所有数据都已删除”的石板后面藏着一处暗格，里面的铭文写着：{/n}“哈维里乌斯·史密罗斯，【数据删除】审判庭成员，【数据删除】审判官的学徒。”

languages.text: {n}Bu hizmeletin kökenine dair tüm verilerin silindiğini iddia eden sahte databelanın ardında gizli bir bölme beliriyor. İçindeki yazıta bir şeyler kazılmış.{/n}"Ordo [sansürlenmiş] Engizisyoncu [sansürlenmiş] Havrilius Smiroth."
languages.original_text: {n}Behind the fake slate stating that all data on this servo-skull's provenance was deleted, a hidden section is revealed. An inscription inside it reads,{/n} "Adept of Inquisitor [redacted] of the Ordo [redacted] Havrilius Smiroth."
